jd: From: Soumya Srivastava, UrBench soumya@urbench.com Reply to: soumya@urbench.com Job Title: Project Manager - Infrastructure MigrationLocation: NY and NJ will have to travel to both location as per clients needsDuration: Long Term ContractDirect client requirement Job Summary:We're seeking an experienced project manager who has handled projects in infrastructure like migration and should be willing to travel to client location at least weekly 3 times. Key Responsibilities:1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.2. 8+ years of experience managing infrastructure projects, including migration.3. Professional certifications (e.g., PMP, PRINCE2, Agile).4. Strong analytical, communication, and leadership skills. Kind Regards, Soumya Srivastava | Head of Recruitment Operations Email: Soumya@urbench.com
